events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all and I do not want to keep it.
The customer's message includes a refund request indicating dissatisfaction with the product size and intent to return.
Routing the refund request regarding incorrect sizing to the returns specialist team for further handling.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and still in its original packaging?
My order number is 5647382910. Yes, the jacket is unused and it’s still in the original packaging with all tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly to send the jacket back.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund approval. I appreciate your assistance in making this process easy.
Your refund case is now resolved. Once we receive the returned jacket, your payment will be processed and credited back to your original method.
We wanted to follow up to make sure you received the refund without any issues and to check if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund has been completed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case now.
